response.overview: Gino Felino is an NYPD detective from Brooklyn who knows everyone and everything in his neighborhood. Killing his partner was someone's big mistake... because he's now out for justice.
response.tagline: He's a cop. It's a dirty job... but somebody's got to take out the garbage.
response.title: Out for Justice

release_dates.note: Later cut on VHS; uncut from DVD onwards
